posts.post_content: Colorshifted variant of Drudge Skeletons. White creatures generally deal with damage prevention and redirection rather the regeneration, so this is an interesting card.

posts.post_content: A fair option for white weenie/control. Regenerate makes for a very resilient blocker that turns into a reusable attacker when pumped by things like Marshal's Anthem and Honor of the Pure.
posts.html:
A fair option for white weenie/control. Regenerate makes for a very resilient blocker that turns into a reusable attacker when pumped by things like Marshal's Anthem and Honor of the Pure.
Report Abuse  
Posted By: Zulp (4/11/2010 9:01:44 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Seeing both Spirit *and* Soldier on one card is overkill. Considering how much WotC has been pushing more tribal-based play, this makes this "colorshifted" card a lot more powerful than its original version. Soldiers have at least 4 "lord" creatures which pump them in various ways, while Skeletons only have [Death Baron](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Death Baron). Don't even get me started on Spirit creatures or Soulshift.  
  
Given the strong tribal power, I'd say Revered Dead is more a colorshifted [Walking Dead](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Walking Dead), though the Zombie tribal isn't anywhere near as strong as both Spirit and Soldier tribals combined.  
  
On another note, when I first saw this card I took it to be the colorshifted version of [Restless Dead](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Restless Dead) rather than [Drudge Skeletons](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Drudge Skeletons). Restless Dead sounds a lot closer to Revered Dead at least.
posts.html:
Seeing both Spirit and Soldier on one card is overkill. Considering how much WotC has been pushing more tribal-based play, this makes this "colorshifted" card a lot more powerful than its original version. Soldiers have at least 4 "lord" creatures which pump them in various ways, while Skeletons only have Death Baron. Don't even get me started on Spirit creatures or Soulshift.

Given the strong tribal power, I'd say Revered Dead is more a colorshifted Walking Dead, though the Zombie tribal isn't anywhere near as strong as both Spirit and Soldier tribals combined.

On another note, when I first saw this card I took it to be the colorshifted version of Restless Dead rather than Drudge Skeletons. Restless Dead sounds a lot closer to Revered Dead at least.
